title: Sašo Fornezzi
text:
Sašo Fornezzi (born 11 December 1982) is a Slovenian former professional <a href="Association%20football">football</a> <a href="Goalkeeper%20%28association%20football%29">goalkeeper</a>.
Club career.
Fornezzi started his career at <a href="NK%20Dravograd">Dravograd</a> and then played three seasons for <a href="NK%20Celje">Celje</a>. He was also loaned to <a href="NK%20Kr%C5%A1ko">Krško</a> in the <a href="Slovenian%20Second%20League">Slovenian Second League</a> before moving to Austrian side <a href="Kapfenberger%20SV">Kapfenberger SV</a> in 2004. Two years later he joined <a href="Grazer%20AK">Grazer AK</a> but left them in 2007 for <a href="Austria%20Wien">Austria Wien</a> after their demotion due to financial difficulties.
Fornezzi then left Austria Wien for the newly-formed Austrian second-division side <a href="FC%20Magna%20Wiener%20Neustadt">FC Magna Wiener Neustadt</a>.
